original_title: De la couleur sur les plaies
overview: Pascal had such a battered, so painful, so violent childhood that he would have every good reason to paint everything black. However, the painter from Gen√ßay puts color everywhere, all the time, without respite, without rest. Compulsive and inexhaustible, his art brut is the tool of his resilience. Throughout the bond that is forged with the director, we follow him on the path to recognition.
title: De la couleur sur les plaies
